attributes.action: Employers to open 25% of job positions for parents 9.30am-2.30pm Monday-Friday
attributes.background:
Change/Create the law - every Employer in the UK have to open mandatory minimum 25% job positions for parents in between the times of  9.30am - 2.30pm Monday to Friday.

Make a scheme parents can apply to check eligibility ( in case they have a child with disability or special needs)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about working patterns are a matter for individual employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
